response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,500. This is an exceptional chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed with the purchase, please let me know, and we will arrange for immediate delivery. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12500}
